thread.title: This is how you can get up to 3 packs of Pampers nappies for FREE at Toys R Us

author: Molly Holt
title: This is how you can get up to 3 packs of Pampers nappies for FREE at Toys R Us
text:
This is how you can get up to 3 packs of Pampers nappies for FREE at Toys R Us Spend up to £15 on nappies and pay nothing at all Share Cut costs with great deals on baby essentials Share Get money updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
An essential for parents all around the world, whether your little terror tot is a newborn or a two year old, buying nappies can get quite pricey. 
The wallet-friendly deal is available through Quidco for all new members, who will receive £15 cashback when they buy any packet of Pampers nappies at Toys R Us . 
As the newborn nappies pack is only £4.99 , many mums can even bag themselves three whole packets of nappies for free as part of the deal. 
If you're only after one pack, you'll still get your full £15 cashback bonus as long as you spend over £4.99 (including delivery) before the 12th March. 
Follow the steps below to find out how to get yours. Read More
